section.p: The Family History Organizer associates a set of observations with a family member. For example, the Family History Organizer can group a set of observations about the patient's father.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-8604, CONF:1198-10497, CONF:1198-32606 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.45"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Family History Organizer template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.45)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1198-32485)

SHALL contain [1..*] component such that it (CONF:1198-32428, CONF:1198-32429)
Conforms to Family History Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.46:2015-08-01)
SHALL conform to Family History Organizer template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.45)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="CLUSTER" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8600, R2.1=CONF:1198-8600)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:8601, R2.1=CONF:1198-8601)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1198-32485)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (R2.1=CONF:1198-8602)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:8602, R2.1=CONF:1198-19099)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] subject such that it (CONF:8609, R2.1=CONF:1198-8609)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] relatedSubject such that it (CONF:15244, R2.1=CONF:1198-15244)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PRS" (CONF:15245, R2.1=CONF:1198-15245)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15246, R2.1=CONF:1198-15246), which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Family Member Value Set 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.19579 DYNAMIC (CONF:15247, R2.1=CONF:1198-15247)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] subject such that it (CONF:15248, R2.1=CONF:1198-15248)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] administrativeGenderCode (CONF:15974, R2.1=CONF:1198-15974), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Administrative Gender (HL7 V3) 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.1 DYNAMIC (CONF:15975, R2.1=CONF:1198-15975)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] birthTime (CONF:15976, R2.1=CONF:1198-15976)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] sDTCDeceasedInd (CONF:15981, R2.1=CONF:1198-15981)
The prefix sdtc: SHALL be bound to the namespace "urn:hl7-org:sdtc". The use of the namespace provides a necessary extension to CDA R2 for the use of the deceasedInd element.
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] sDTCDeceasedTime (CONF:15982, R2.1=CONF:1198-15982)
The prefix sdtc: SHALL be bound to the namespace "urn:hl7-org:sdtc". The use of the namespace provides a necessary extension to CDA R2 for the use of the deceasedTime element.
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] sDTCId (CONF:15249, R2.1=CONF:1198-15249)
The prefix sdtc: SHALL be bound to the namespace "urn:hl7-org:sdtc". The use of the namespace provides a necessary extension to CDA R2 for the use of the id element.
age of a relative at the time of a family history observation SHOULD be inferred by comparing RelatedSubject/subject/birthTime with Observation/effectiveTime (CONF:15983, R2.1=CONF:1198-15983)

SHALL contain [1..*] component such that it (CONF:1198-32428, CONF:1198-32429)
Conforms to Family History Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.46:2015-08-01)

body.codeblock: <organizer xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="CLUSTER" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.45" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.45"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1545150777"/> <statusCode code="completed"/> <component> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.46" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.46"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="431977323"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> </observation> </component> </organizer>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:10497 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.45"
SHALL conform to CDA Organizer
Consol Family History Organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="CLUSTER" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8600, R2.1=CONF:1198-8600)
Consol Family History Organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:8601, R2.1=CONF:1198-8601)

Consol Family History Organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (R2.1=CONF:1198-8602)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:8602, R2.1=CONF:1198-19099)
Consol Family History Organizer SHALL contain [1..*] component such that it (CONF:8607, CONF:16888) Conforms to Family History Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.46)
Consol Family History Organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] subject, where its type is Subject (CONF:8609, R2.1=CONF:1198-8609)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root=""
SHALL conform to CDA Subject
Consol Subject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] relatedSubject, where its type is Related Subject (CONF:15244, R2.1=CONF:1198-15244)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root=""
SHALL conform to CDA Related Subject
Consol Related Subject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PRS" (CONF:15245, R2.1=CONF:1198-15245)

Consol Related Subject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15246, R2.1=CONF:1198-15246), which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Family Member Value Set 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.19579 DYNAMIC (CONF:15247, R2.1=CONF:1198-15247)
Consol Related Subject SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] subject, where its type is Subject Person (CONF:15248, R2.1=CONF:1198-15248)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root=""

Consol Subject Person age of a relative at the time of a family history observation SHOULD be inferred by comparing RelatedSubject/subject/birthTime with Observation/effectiveTime (CONF:15983, R2.1=CONF:1198-15983)
SHALL conform to CDA Subject Person

Consol Subject Person SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] administrativeGenderCode (CONF:15974, R2.1=CONF:1198-15974), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Administrative Gender (HL7 V3) 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.1 DYNAMIC (CONF:15975, R2.1=CONF:1198-15975)
Consol Subject Person SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] birthTime (CONF:15976, R2.1=CONF:1198-15976)
Consol Subject Person MAY contain zero or one [0..1] sDTCDeceasedInd (CONF:15981, R2.1=CONF:1198-15981)
Consol Subject Person MAY contain zero or one [0..1] sDTCDeceasedTime (CONF:15982, R2.1=CONF:1198-15982)
Consol Subject Person SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] sDTCId (CONF:15249, R2.1=CONF:1198-15249)
